Quality Education.reason: As a master's level course, its core purpose is to provide quality education by developing critical thinking, theoretical understanding, and academic writing skills.
evidence: 透過文化社會學建立批判性視野，運用於學術論文寫作與文化評論寫作 (Establish a critical perspective through cultural sociology and apply it to academic thesis writing and cultural criticism)
理解文化社會學的重要典範與方法 (Understand the important paradigms and methods of cultural sociology)
本課重視文獻閱讀，須深入文本，進行具方向性的批判性閱讀 (This course emphasizes literature reading, requiring in-depth textual analysis and directed critical reading)
